title: Do grades have any impact on life post-high school? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's not really the actual grade that has the impact but the work ethic to get those grades that truly impact you after high school.

If you want to go to a good college, then of course. But afterwards, not really. But that doesn't mean that you have to deliberately ignore your duties as a student because of this answer. Because you can use the things that you have learned during high school.

Just in the beginning, later they turn trivial as what you make in your life becomes based in more important stuff, more relevant decisions than grades. Stuff like perseverance, being honest, commitment, etc, are what turn your life for the best.  Then God comes in, and your life turn to be the best in can be... if you understand what he's trying to do with you of course :)
